data.title: Ugo Foscolo
data.text:
AKA Niccol√≤ Foscolo

Born: 6-Feb-1778

Birthplace: Zakinthos, Greece

Died: 10-Sep-1827

Location of death: London, England

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Buried, Church of Santa Croce, Florence, Italy

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Occupation: Playwright, Poet, Novelist

Nationality: Italy

Executive summary: The Last Letters of Jacopo Ortis

Military service: French Army (captain, Italian Division, 1799-)

University: University of Padua

Author of books:

A Bonaparte liberatore (1797, poetry)

Ultime lettere di Jacopo Ortis (1802, novel, The Last Letters of Jacopo Ortis)

Le grazie (1822, poetry)

Wrote plays:

Tieste (1797)

Aiace (1811)

Ricciarda (1812)

Do you know something we don't?
